column4: When I put the Ubuntu CD that I ordered into my laptop(it works fine on my desktop), my laptop starts SHAKING. I push enter to boot Ubuntu, and then a strange console thing appears. When tht goes away, I see a blue/purple/black screen with strange symbols like #%$$^&%*%($[[] ] ] . I then turn off my laptop as I'm scared. What is going on???????
select the option to scan the disk
I did the scan and it said it was OK
what kind fo laptop is it?
